headline: HAS Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Hasbro, Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 16, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, announces the filing of a class action lawsuit on behalf of purchasers of common stock of Hasbro, Inc. ...
